id: # project is a | separated list of 'project ; intelTooltip ; intelCompletedMessage' with project as specified in 'terraforming_projects.csv'. They contain requirements
tooltip_incomplete: etc that control what this industry does. intelTooltip and intelCompletedMessage are optional
tooltip_complete: but intelTooltip must be specified for intelCompletedMessage to be specified

id: # requirements and requirements_hidden not handled by projects
projects: these are only whether the building can be built. They also need a reason paired with it for display purposes. May be able to change it in the future
industry_chameleon_decivilized ; Decivilized subpopulation ; Eradicated | industry_chameleon_rogue_ai ; Rogue AI core ; Terminated
